page.title: 04INDUSTRY- ROCKWARE GLASS
page.content: Situated in the north-east area of the block.Has been in Irvine for 65 years. {Manufactures-}bottles for containing mainly alcohol. {Exports-}to America and also parts of Europe. {Imports-}sand from Jamaica and Spain. Any broken glass from the plant can be recycled. There are {180,000,000}bottles made a year at{Rockware. {Employees-}in 1980 there were 770 people working in Rockware.Now there are only 386 employees five of whom are disabled. {Benefits-}protective clothing provided, Christmas party for workers children. {Wages-}Â£179 for a highly paid worker. {Future-}more redundancies even though they are introducing a new product.
